definition: drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell

sentences.english: The gases may puff up the belly in particular.
sentences.chinese: 气体尤其会在腹部鼓胀起来。

sentences.english: Conclusion Guzhangpian (tympany tablet) has a better anti-liver-fibrosis effect.
sentences.chinese: 结论鼓胀片有较好的抗肝纤维化作用。

sentences.english: And The flung Spray and the blown spume, and the sea-gulls crying.
sentences.chinese: 还有翻滚的浪花，鼓胀的泡沫，以及海鸥的啼叫。

sentences.english: Fads breed in empty heads and full purses.
sentences.chinese: 流行时尚从空虚的头脑和鼓胀的钱包中产生。

sentences.english: His breathing was hoarse, his face livid, his limbs flaccid , his belly prominent.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸声沙哑，脸色苍白，双腿无力，肚子鼓胀。

sentences.english: Feel - to the rising bosom's inmost core.
sentences.chinese: 感到在我们鼓胀的胸中最深的地方。

sentences.english: PICTURES of hunger usually show passive eyes and swollen bellies.
sentences.chinese: 关于饥饿的照片通常表现出消极的眼神和鼓胀的腹部。

sentences.english: The minimum thickness appeared in the bulging highest position.
sentences.chinese: 最小厚度发生在鼓胀最高的地方。

sentences.english: See, where their white sails, bellying in the wind, speckle the.
sentences.chinese: 看，那迎风鼓胀的白帆点缀着碧蓝与翠绿之处。

sentences.english: You have loose skin and bulging of the abdomen, after 4 pregnancies.
sentences.chinese: 你松弛的皮肤和鼓胀的腹部怀孕后4。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical therapeutic effectiveness of anti-liver-fibrosis of Guzhangpian (tympany tablet).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼓胀片抗肝纤维化的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Jiro waddled closer, his belly bulging and distended.
sentences.chinese: 伊罗步履蹒跚地走近，肚子鼓胀凸出。

sentences.english: His big belly swells out like a pot.
sentences.chinese: 他的大肚子鼓胀着像个大锅。

definition: perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
to summon one's (courage, faith etc)/to puff up (one's cheeks etc)/to bulge/to swell out
